SUKA SUKA!

İnsanların neden hala oynadığını anlayamadığım modası geçmiş, mekaniklerin kötü olduğu oldschool kafa FPS oyunu. Klasik hilelerden, trollerden ve toxiclerden bahsetmeye gerek var mı? Rainbox Six oynayın arkadaşım!

Bu tarz oyunları OYNAMADIĞIM twitch kanalıma beklerim -> www.twitch.tv/jrvigilante ^^

Highly recommended from me. But without prime is a lot of cheaters, when you have prime there are some but not like on non pirme, so i will not recommend buying prime like i did if you playning a lot of cs so, i little bit FUGGED it up. I will highly recommend to buy pass cause it will give your money back with profit from opening operators or with such a luck expensive skin from packs (If you opening skins for stars you will get nothing probably but you can try) if i will not give 30 stars to these packs i will get 8 euro more back, you can look at my Inventory i got from 55zł to 65-68zł so not bad good, oh and i got diamond token from playning 4 days straith for missions.
Alto juegaso, re divertido para pasar el rato y jugar competitivamente

free to play ruined this game. matchmaking is nothing but kids with walls thinking theyre sweet cause they bought another account to avoid game bans on their main. thanks valve! literally the most toxic game ever. they dont care so neither should anyone else

sucha a dumb game that's full of hackers ever since they made it free to play,
even if u have prime status, it doesnt even help, u will still be matched up with new accounts without prime that are hacking for some reason, $20 SGD for prime status that doesnt even work against hackers, 
+ they dont even do anything about the hackers, no ban waves recently and every game that i've played, it's always hacker vs hacker,

spoil the fun of this game, not recommended, dont buy or download this stupid shit ass hacker game
